label: AppliedAllowanceCharge
comment: The applied allowance or charge component of pricing.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the reason for this applied allowance charge.
The calculation percentage for this trade price.
The applied tax category of this applied allowance charge.
The indication of whether or not the applied allowance charge is a charge.

referencedBy.comment: Applied allowance charge information related to this calculated price.
